title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.40 - Credit arrangements and monthly reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.40 - Credit arrangements and monthly reports

State Regulations

All charges under this schedule of charges shall be
payable in cash as they are incurred unless credit arrangements satisfactory to
the treasurer have been made in advance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1263.40

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
